subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: Pepsi Max 400 at Auto Club Speedway
lead_paragraph: Tony Stewart outdueled the points leader Jimmie Johnson on a late restart and pulled away to win the Pepsi Max 400 at Auto Club Speedway.
snippet: Tony Stewart outdueled the points leader Jimmie Johnson on a late restart and pulled away to win the Pepsi Max 400 at Auto Club Speedway.
